        @Bean(name="shadowMongoTemplate")
public org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoTemplate shadowMongoTemplate(de.flapdoodle.embed.mongo.MongodProcess mongodProcess)
                                                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a shadow template configuration by adding "-shadow" as postfix of database name. This is used to replicate the entire database structure in a shadow/temporary database location
